[api/model/chat](/api/modules/api_model_chat.md).ChatMuteDuration

Valid durations for muting a chat using muteChat

## Enumeration Members

### EIGHT\_HOURS

• **EIGHT\_HOURS** = ``"EIGHT_HOURS"``

Mutes chat for 8 hours

___

### FOREVER

• **FOREVER** = ``"FOREVER"``

Mutes chat forever

___

### ONE\_WEEK

• **ONE\_WEEK** = ``"ONE_WEEK"``

Mutes chat for 1 week
